summary: This is a 1998 application form for the Interlochen Arts Camp, requesting personal, financial aid, and class selection information from a prospective student. The document appears to be a standard camp application with no direct mention of Epstein-related activities, though it originates from the Epstein case document set.

persons.name: Nicolette Solomon
persons.context: The name appears as the sender/contact on the fax header of the Interlochen Arts Camp application form.

keyFacts: Document is a 1998 application form for the Interlochen Arts Camp.
The form requests detailed personal, financial aid, and academic/arts class selection information.
The document originates from the Epstein case files (EFTA00090416/EFTA00090417) but contains no explicit references to Jeffrey Epstein, associates, or criminal activity.
The application includes a section for non-U.S. citizens to provide additional information.
The form outlines a process for audition-based and non-audition-based major/minor class selections for the camp.
